transcript:
I hold to the principle that a maiden has a full right to choose. I give you freedom. Only remember that your life's happiness depends on your de- cision. Never mind me!" 
"But I do not know. Father!" 
"There's no need to talk! He receives his orders and will marry you or anybody; but you are free to choose. ... Go to your room, think it over, and come back in an hour and tell me in his presence: yes or no. I know you will pray over it. Well, pray if you like, but you had bet- ter think i
